verses.name: Isaiah 14:10
verses.text: All they shall speak and say unto thee, Art thou also become weak as we? art thou become like unto us?

verses.name: Isaiah 14:11
verses.text: Thy pomp is brought down to the grave, and the noise of thy viols: the worm is spread under thee, and the worms cover thee.

verses.name: Isaiah 14:12
verses.text: How art thou fallen from heaven, O Lucifer, son of the morning! how art thou cut down to the ground, which didst weaken the nations!
